content: Millôr Fernandes, who translated four of Shakespeare's plays (Hamlet, The Taming of the Shrew, King Lear, and The Merry Wives of Windsor) into Portuguese, did not speak English.
translations: ita:Millôr Fernandes, che tradusse in portoghese quattro delle opere di Shakespeare (Amleto, La bisbetica domata, Re Lear e
